unnormalised: Arre bhai, kall mhun Crawford Market-ant gel'lom. Duslle fulam thoddi sovai darant melltali mhunn. To monis bod'dheak ₹800/kg sangta! Magir to mhojea tonddak polheta ani mhunta, "Tumchea khatir special price, fakt Rs 750!". Mhaka dhokho zala mhunn ₹50 vachle mhunn. Tea darant, mhaka Diwali-chi bhett viktelem SBI-chean loan ghevnk poddtele! To khoinchea Ambani-cho cousin mhunn chintto astolo. Pudhen D-Mart-acher ravtolom, tori te "authentic" komi asle tori. Punn tanche "MRP ₹699" mhunje *khorench* ₹699, dhondo suru korpachi tharavich zaga nhoi.
normalised: Arre bhai, hanv kal Crawford Market-ak gel'lo. Maka dislem sukhi mewanchem thodek komi daaman meutolem mhunn. To monis badaamak kilo-k aathso rupiya sangtale! Magir to mhojea tonddak polleita ani mhunta, "Tuje khatir special daam, fokot saatso pachas rupiya!". Hanv pachas rupiya bachoun khuxi zai mhunn taka dista. Tea daarani, Diwali-chi bhetto gheuncheak maka S-B-I koddlean karz gheunk poddttolem! To chintta zaait hanv Ambani-cho cousin ashe mhunn. Dusrea vella, hanv D-Mart-akuch rautolom, kiteak na zalear tem "authentic" komi ashe mhunn. Atleast tanchi "M-R-P so so ekunsatth rupiya" mhunnttlear *khorench* so so ekunsatth rupiya, bol'lo-bol'li korcheachi survaat nhoi.

Punn tanche "MRP ₹699" mhunje *khorench* ₹699, dhondo suru korpachi tharavich zaga nhoi.
